description: a(n) = T(2n,n-2), T given by A026670.
comments: Also a(n) = T(2n,n-2) = T(2n+1,n+2), T given by A026725.Also a(n) = T(2n,n-2), T given by A026736.Column k=6 of triangle A236830. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 02 2014
formula: G.f.: (x^2*C(x)^6)/(1-x*C(x)^3) where C(x) is the g.f. of A000108. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 02 2014
author: _Clark Kimberling_
